[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/dot_experience_hero.jpg” alt=”Dot Foods Trucks” title_text=”dot_experience_hero” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When Dot is a Part of Your Story, You’ll Find:

A people-centric, family-first environment focused on YOU

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”55px|||54px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Cares.

We care enough to not cut corners; to be one of the safest fleets on the road. We care to do things the right way when we load and unload our trucks, serve our customers, and send our drivers on runs. We care about you and what’s going to make you successful.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LzaZk7_etAs” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” global_module=”33896″ background_color=”#f9f9f9″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Apply-Now@2x.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”226px” height_phone=”150px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”25px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”8%||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apply Today & Discover Your Forever Career

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/dotfoods?r=drivefordot” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Apply Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”13%||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0%||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” animation_style=”bounce” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Need More Information Before You Apply? We’d love to talk to you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”support” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”55%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An in-house support system rooting for your success

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI), your success is our success. That’s why we have a robust in-house team of professionals and specialists here to help you every step of the way.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dispatch” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/dispatch@2x.jpg” alt=”dispatch” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot drivers work with the same dispatch specialist on all of their runs. This fosters a personal relationship where your needs are prioritized. Dot’s dispatch team works hard to schedule your runs around important personal and family events whenever they can.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Gate Station” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Gatestation@2x.jpg” alt=”Gate Station” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot’s gate station employees are there to keep you safe and encourage integrity within the food supply chain. They are a resource to help keep you organized and a team you can count on no matter which Dot distribution center (DC) you arrive at.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Garage” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/garage@2x.jpg” alt=”garage” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No more extreme delays while waiting for someone to come out and fix your truck. Dot takes pride in having an in-house garage team at each DC filled with truck experts. They work tirelessly to keep our trucks in the best shape so Dot drivers are safe out on the road.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Management” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/management@2x.jpg” alt=”management” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot’s management team is here for you. With our open-door policy, you can come to them with anything and everything. They want your candid feedback and to know how they can make your Dot experience better.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Health Trainer” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/healthtrainers@2x.jpg” alt=”Health Trainer” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

From in-person meetings to Zoom calls while you’re on the road and YouTube video resources, our occupational health trainers and physical therapists are here to make sure you’re the safest and healthiest you can be while on the road.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dot Driver” image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/dotdriver@2x.jpg” alt=”Dot Driver” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your fellow drivers are another great network and resource for you to lean on when you drive for Dot. They share your pride in sporting Dot Blue and always look forward to getting to know new drivers on the team.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_id=”respect” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_margin=”100px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||43px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A workplace founded & focused on respect

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”65%” width_tablet=”85%” width_phone=”85%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” height_tablet=”auto” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”38px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When Robert and Dorothy Tracy founded Dot Foods, they stuck by the Golden Rule: Treat others the way you would want to be treated. Thirty years after its founding, that sentiment of respect, honesty, teamwork, accountability, and family continues to hold strong in DTI today.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Respect_com.mp4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_id=”well-being” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An employer where your well-being is the #1 priority

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||58px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/hometime.jpg” alt=”Dot Truck” title_text=”Dot Truck” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”59px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Weekly Home Time

Part of your well-being is being at home with your family—so we get you home weekly. Some Dot locations also offer other schedule options that get you home more frequently if that fits better with your lifestyle.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”right” custom_padding=”59px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top-Notch Safety Records

Dot drivers have a safety-first mindset and take pride in being some of the safest drivers on the road. They rank in the top 20 percent nationally in six of the seven key safety categories. DTI is also an industry leader in minimizing personal injuries

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/safetyjpg.jpg” alt=”Safety” title_text=”Safety” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||54px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/trainingcomp.mp4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”40px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Best-in-the-Industry Training

You feeling confident and safe on the road is our goal. We want you to succeed—so we have a robust training program that every Dot driver goes through. You’ll be able to hit the road solo once you’re comfortable behind the wheel of a Dot truck and our trainers give you the A-OK.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_line_height=”2.2em” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Unbeatable Benefits

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_line_height=”2.2em” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”-25px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your well-being is all-encompassing:
✔️ Physical
✔️ Mental
✔️ Financial

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”75%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”-15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

That’s why we offer you and your family access to a benefits package that is designed to support all three of those areas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Benefitscomp.mp4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-bottom” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”50%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Switch to Dot Transportation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’re not here to sugar-coat things. Here’s why making the switch to drive for Dot is 100% worth the effort.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/working-at-dti/make-the-switch/” button_text=”See Why” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0082ca” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”10px|32px|10px|32px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No-Touch or Delivery Driver?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At DTI, you have the option to shape your career into what you’re looking for. Discover the right position for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/blog/no-touch-or-delivery-driver-discover-the-right-position-for-you/” button_text=”Learn More” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0082ca” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”10px|20px|10px|20px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”site-footer” _builder_version=”4.9.11″ background_color=”#f0efef” min_height=”473px” custom_padding=”13px||0px|||” global_module=”28068″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”drivefordotfooter” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/DOT_Blue_adv_website.png” _builder_version=”3.27.3″ width=”33%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”28px” min_height=”195px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||-2%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1 Dot Way

P.O. Box 208

Mt. Sterling, IL 62353

excerpt.rendered: When Dot is a Part of Your Story, You’ll Find: A people-centric, family-first environment focused on YOUDot Cares. We care enough to not cut corners; to be one of the safest fleets on the road. We care to do things the right way when we load and unload our trucks, serve our customers, and send […]
